column5: Was going to post the same thing.  If he's going to emulate a great muskie hunter, then Lew it is!  Great stuff...congrats on the PB!
very nice ski man....clean lookin fish

Headed out for muskie opener today, left the house at 3 AM and we were on the water by 5:30 AM  Started throwing bucktails and spinners and within the first 10 min at the weedbed I get a massive fish follow my bait to the boat!  I throw out the cast again and work it slower through the same area, BAM! Fish on first muskie of the season and not a bad fish at all! After we brought her to the boat she measured 44 inches and was thick healthy fish. Didn't need much reviving took off right away and after this fish we only saw one more follow and that was it for our muskie opener! At least we didn't get skunked and I did get a PB so I can say that I am very happy! Also the Ranger has been muskie slimmed for the first time and definately not the last!  Here is a pic of the fish
Nice muskie! I'm looking to hook one this summer as well.
nice ski!
Atta boy! I luv that 20# smallie in your avatar!!
WTG man! Congrats on the PB and getting your new ride slimed up!
nice one,congrats on the pb
nice looking fish!
Very nice minnow.  Looks like a number of folks are having success on opening day.    Congrats on the PB.   Next trip 45+ ?
Awesome start to the season!!!....nice job  WHY do I have to wait so long for the season to open here on the Ottawa River    12 more DAYS to go
Very nice..congrats on your PB.
Congrats on your PB nice looking muskie  Rob
Beauty fish, Congrats
Well done minnow, that's a purty fish! -Brian
Congrats Minnow - great way to start the season off
Very nice Musky! Must have gave you a good scrap!!
WTG minnow. Congrats on the PB as well as sliming your ride. You will never get that smell out of your carpet, and as Martha would say "that's a good thing".
nicely done
nice fish and thanks for posting
nice ski..... You don't look too happy , who pissied in your corn flakes .....
He is doing his Lew impression! and might I say he is doing a fantastic job!  Nice fish man!  G
Awesome fish man!  Glad you had some success!!! Gratz on slimming the boat..
Very impressive fish, congrat's!
G'Dang dooooood.  There ya go.!.!.!

right on man, that's a nice one...funny to think that in most places they have to be that big just to count as a so called keeper...yeee haww...a 44 is a great PB..ya got the bug for a bigger one yet??
Congrats on the PB Minnow! Sure smells good, eh?
